instructions: Open Google Photos and tap any image or video in your gallery that you'd like to share. Tap the Share icon in the bottom left corner. Under Send in Google Photos, tap the name of the user you want to message. You can create a group to message multiple people at once, or tap more to search by phone number or email address. You'll be taken to the new messaging screen with a thumbnail preview of your photo. Tap send or write out a message to go along with the image.
